alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 9:55AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, NORTHWESTERN LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN BROWN AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 AM EDT... At 954 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Washington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Maysville, Washington, West Union, Manchester, Ripley, Aberdeen, Lewisburg, Rome, Concord, Trinity, Murphysville, Moranburg, Dunkinsville, Carrs, Bradysville, State Route 348 at State Route 125, Mays Lick, Rectorville, Peed and Bentonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
